name: Only One Tower: Defense
description:
Made for the GMTK Game jam 2019

You have one tower that you can reposition at the start of every turn, by clicking one of the coloured tiles. Depending on the colour of the tile, the tower will receive different upgrades.

Note: The tilemap has artifacts unless in fullscreen.

Assets from: https://www.kenney.nl/

Made by Sonderbo & Planktoon1
